rules.natural: If the TomatoPlant has a disease, then the TomatoPlant needs irrigation.

Provided that the automated system is enabled for the CurrentGrowingSeason time period, whenever the weather prediction for the CurrentGrowingSeason time period indicates a drought, either a manual override is needed for the AutomatedIrrigationSystem device or the TomatoPlant does not have a disease.
The SurveyDrone device flying implies that data from the SurveyDrone device has not been uploaded.

rules.prover9_expression: (storage_capacity_available(facility, FarmWarehouse) | (market_price_favorable(plant, TomatoPlant) | (-(sensor_malfunction(device, SoilMoistureSensor) | network_down(platform, FarmCloudPlatform)) -> -has_high_yield(plant, TomatoPlant))))
rules.natural: Storage capacity is available at the FarmWarehouse facility, or the market price is favorable for the TomatoPlant, or provided that it is not the case that (the SoilMoistureSensor device has a malfunction or the network for the FarmCloudPlatform platform is down), the TomatoPlant does not have a high yield.
Whenever the soil test shows low nutrients for the TomatoPlant, the TomatoPlant requires fertilizer.
Under the condition that the AgronomyTeam expert consultant is engaged, the TomatoPlant does not have a disease.
Facing market competition by the AgriFarm farm leads to the AgriFarm farm not being profitable.
Should the SoilMoistureSensor device have a malfunction, then the TomatoPlant does not need irrigation.
Given that the network for the FarmCloudPlatform platform is down, the TomatoPlant does not need irrigation.
If the soil nutrients are optimal for the TomatoPlant, then the sunlight is adequate for the TomatoPlant.
Whenever the sunlight is adequate for the TomatoPlant, the TomatoPlant does not have a high yield.
It is not the case that (if the SurveyDrone device is flying, then data from the SurveyDrone device has been uploaded) implies that the field survey for the HarvestTime time period is complete.
It is not the case that (either the soil test shows low nutrients for the TomatoPlant or the AgronomyTeam expert consultant is engaged) leads to preventive measures being active at the AgriFarm farm.
Should it not be true that (the soil test shows low nutrients for the TomatoPlant or the AgronomyTeam expert consultant is engaged), then preventive measures are not active at the AgriFarm farm.

If it is not true that (whenever sustainable practices are implemented at the AgriFarm farm, the TomatoPlant does not have a high yield), then eco-certification has not been awarded to the AgriFarm farm.

Provided that it is not the case that (either the SoilMoistureSensor device has a malfunction or the network for the FarmCloudPlatform platform is down), sustainable practices are implemented at the AgriFarm farm.
Whenever it is not the case that (the SoilMoistureSensor device has a malfunction or the network for the FarmCloudPlatform platform is down), the TomatoPlant has a high yield.

Under the condition that it is not true that (the SoilMoistureSensor device has a malfunction or the network for the FarmCloudPlatform platform is down), the soil nutrients are optimal for the TomatoPlant.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(-(sustainable_practices_implemented(farm, AgriFarm) -> -has_high_yield(plant, TomatoPlant)) -> eco_certification_awarded(farm, AgriFarm)) -> government_subsidy_received(farm, AgriFarm)) -> farm_is_profitable(farm, AgriFarm))
rules.natural: Should it be true that it is false that (it is not the case that (given that it is false that (the implementation of sustainable practices at the AgriFarm farm implies that the TomatoPlant does not have a high yield), eco-certification has been awarded to the AgriFarm farm) leads to the AgriFarm farm receiving a government subsidy), then the AgriFarm farm is profitable.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(-(sustainable_practices_implemented(farm, AgriFarm) -> -has_high_yield(plant, TomatoPlant)) -> eco_certification_awarded(farm, AgriFarm)) -> government_subsidy_received(farm, AgriFarm)) -> faces_market_competition(farm, AgriFarm))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that (it is not the case that (given that it is false that (the implementation of sustainable practices at the AgriFarm farm implies that the TomatoPlant does not have a high yield), eco-certification has been awarded to the AgriFarm farm) leads to the AgriFarm farm receiving a government subsidy), the AgriFarm farm faces market competition.
Provided that the automated system is not enabled for the CurrentGrowingSeason time period, the SurveyDrone device is flying.
Whenever global demand for the TomatoMarket market is not strong, the TomatoPlant has a disease.
